A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
After watching it a second time\, I think the film is even more disappointing than the first time I watched it. 

Yes\, there are moments that were entertaining\, yes the acting was good (very good in some cases\,) but above all: I think this movie is a big missed opportunity. 

My thoughts right now are a bit disjointed\, I'm just home from the theatre. But my overall sentiment is: what a waste.
